exp-1-text: Development of web applications participating in frontend and backend development tasks as part of teams working under Agile, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies using the MERN stack (React.js, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL).
exp-2-text: Development of websites using WordPress and Elementor, development of PHP web applications using the MVC pattern with Symfony and Laravel, creation of RESTful APIs, consumption of RESTful APIs, and development of frontend and mobile web applications for Android and iOS using Vue.js and Ionic.
